PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : fixed dimension of the MA part. If p= -1, the algorithm reduces to the classical Levinson recursions.
: matrix containing the Rk's (d*d matrices for a d-dimensional process).It must be given the following way
: list-type variable, giving the successively calculated polynomials (degree 1 to degree n),with coefficients Ak

DESCRIPTION.P: solves recursively on n (p being fixed) the following system (normal equations), i.e. identifies the AR part (poles) of a vector ARMA(n,p) process
where {Rk;k=1,nlag} is the sequence of empirical covariances
